00027 /**********************************************************/
00037 class GameNavigationState : public GameState {
00038         public:
00039                 GameNavigationState();
00040 
00041                 //** Prepares state subsystems and scripts.
00042                 void Init();
00043 
00044                 //** Cleans up any remaining state assets.
00045                 void Cleanup();
00046 
00047                 //** Halts execution of the state's operations.
00048                 void Pause();
00049 
00050                 //** Resumes state execution.
00051                 void Resume();
00052 
00053                 //** Handles any events that are particular to the state
00054                 bool HandleEvents(  PlatformEngine* game,
00055                                SDL_Event& event );
00056 
00057                 //** Updates the state's logic
00058                 void Update(        PlatformEngine* game );
00059                 
00060                 //** Draws the visual content of the state to the engine. 
00061                 void Draw(          PlatformEngine* game );
00062                 
00063                 //** Acts as if the Player is moving 'upward'
00064                 bool MovePlayerUp();
00065 
00066                 //** Acts as if the Player is moving 'downward'
00067                 bool MovePlayerDown();
00068 
00069                 //** Acts as if the Player is moving 'to the left'
00070                 bool MovePlayerLeft();
00071 
00072                 //** Acts as if the Player is moving 'to the right'
00073                 bool MovePlayerRight();
00074 
00075         protected:
00076                 
00077                 //** Object representing the entire map used in this state
00078                 GameMap* theMap;
00079 };
